title: Auto-inject CCMUX context environment variables on pane spawn
description: When spawning any pane, automatically inject environment variables that identify the ccmux context: CCMUX_PANE_ID (UUID of the pane), CCMUX_SESSION_ID (UUID of the session), CCMUX_WINDOW_ID (UUID of the window), and CCMUX_SESSION_NAME (human-readable session name). This enables Claude Code instances and other processes to be self-aware of their ccmux context without requiring explicit configuration.
user_impact: Enables Claude Code instances to identify which pane they're running in, use MCP tools on themselves, and coordinate with other Claude instances across panes
